title: Legend of the Child
description: Rae had the perfect life on a quiet Kansas farm. She was happy. She was free. She was safe.That all changed the day he came up the driveway.“Legend of the Child” is the first installment of a fantasy/adventure trilogy filled with history, family secrets and self-discovery.When Rae’s mysterious Uncle Sam shows up, he changes everything on the farm and nothing can ever go back to the way it was. Rae must cope with her newly discovered role in the protection of the world against ancient, evil forces. Meanwhile she has to learn who she can trust in a world where even her name has been kept from her…
author: D.L.   Anderson
